-- | Compute CRC16 checksums using a lookup table.
--   
--   Compute a CRC16 checksum of some bytes using a lookup table.
--   
--   This table matches the particular CRC flavor used by Crystalfontz
--   LCDs. If you can extend this code to suit another application, or have
--   any other improvements, please send me suggestions or patches.
@package crc16-table
@version 0.1


-- | Compute CRC16 checksums using a lookup table.
module Data.Digest.Table.CRC16

-- | Compute the CRC16 checksum of some bytes.
crc16 :: [Word8] -> Word16
